landmarks.name: The Glowing Pillar
landmarks.description: A glowing pillar, swallowing all sound around it.

landmarks.name: The Obsidian Cairn
landmarks.description: A obsidian cairn, humming a low, vibrating note.

landmarks.name: The Eerie Monolith
landmarks.description: A eerie monolith, home to a silent, white-haired hermit.

landmarks.name: The Perfectly smooth Cave
landmarks.description: A perfectly smooth cave, bearing the marks of a thousand years.

landmarks.name: The Weather-worn Cave
landmarks.description: A weather-worn cave, whispering in an unknown, melodic tongue.

landmarks.name: The Moss-covered Statue
landmarks.description: A moss-covered statue, swallowing all sound around it.

landmarks.name: The Eerie Monolith
landmarks.description: A eerie monolith, swarming with spectral, blue butterflies.

ruins.name: Cursed Forge
ruins.description: An ancient cursed forge from the First Age.
ruins.history: Cursed Forge was once a center of magic before its fall.
